Spirit Steed.name: Spirit Steed
Spirit Steed.fullText:
Glorious Spirit Utility 26Spirit Steed

Appearing from nowhere, a winged spirit steed carries you beside your foe.

At-Will  
Immediate Reaction      Personal

Trigger: The enemy designated by your Worthy Foe feature ends its movement within 6 squares of you

Effect: You fly and land in a space adjacent to the triggering enemy. This movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 171.
